group_1.textRight: Aaagh, Mitamacho! How could you hide this@from us?!
I knew it!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what?

group_1.textRight: Emiri! Hinano! What did you uncover?!
Did you find evidence of Mitama's terminal@illness?!

group_1.textLeft: Terminal illness? What are you talking@about?

group_1.textRight: Well, her fingertips are yellow...
It has to be because of an illness...right?

group_1.textLeft: Ah ha ha! Asukyan, you're such a worrywort!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: We found a whole load of cardboard boxes@outside.
We thought they were empty, so we figured@we'd trash 'em...

group_1.textRight: Myako-senpai's back totally gave out when@she tried to lift one up!
She was all, "Owieee!!!"

group_1.textLeft: Sh-shut up! That's not part of the story!
ANYWAY, they were so hard to lift 'cause@they were packed full of tangerines.

group_1.textRight: I had no idea Mitamacho was such a diehard@citrus fan!
Tangerines? But what do they have to do@with her illness?

group_1.textLeft: Asuka, she isn't sick.
Um, I'm afraid I've been keeping a secret@this whole time.
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I just adooore sitting snug under a blanket@and eating tangerines♪

group_1.textRight: Wh-what?
So your fingertips turned yellow because@you ate so many?

group_1.textLeft: I believe so?
I only intended to eat a few, but I might@have overdone it...

group_1.textRight: *Sob*
Such an utter disgrace...
Being humiliated once was enough, but to@make a fool of myself twice!
I must assume responsibility for my shame!
And kill myself!

group_1.textLeft: No, not allowed! No killing yourself!

group_1.textRight: U-ughhh! But I...but I...!

group_1.textLeft: Look, just calm down.
It's a good thing that Mitama's healthy@after all, isn't it?

group_1.textCenter: How about all of you eat some tangerines@once the cleaning is done?

group_1.textRight: You just can't get through all those boxes by@yourself, is that it?

group_1.textLeft: Really... It's not as if I need help@finishing them before they go bad!
I wasn't thinking that at all!

group_1.textRight: That's exactly what you were thinking.
...Hm? Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Is that a...good luck rake?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes! It is!
I bought it as a charm back when I became@a Coordinator! To rake in the sales!
I completely forgot to ever hang it up, but@it did a great job anyway♪

group_1.textRight: Does that mean you already bought a new@decoration for next year?
If you did, I could give you a hand@setting it up.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, are you sure? [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]That'd be such a weight@off my back.
Hold on for just a moment. I need to go get@them from the back.
This...and this... [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Goodness, there are so@many.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Are those...

group_1.textCenter: Tan, tan, tangerines♪@I'll just have another five, then I'll stop.
